changeSet.author: cab379
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE role_attr_temp ( "ATTR_DATA_ID" VARCHAR2(40 BYTE), "OBJ_ID" VARCHAR2(36 BYTE), "VER_NBR" NUMBER(8,0) DEFAULT 1, "ROLE_MBR_ID" VARCHAR2(40 BYTE), "KIM_TYP_ID" VARCHAR2(40 BYTE), "KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID" VARCHAR2(40 BYTE), "ATTR_VAL" VARCHAR2(400 BYTE)) /
insert into role_attr_temp (ROLE_MBR_ID) select ROLE_MBR_ID from KRIM_ROLE_MBR_T where ACTV_TO_DT is null and ROLE_ID = '100000295' and ROLE_MBR_ID not in (select role_mbr_id from KRIM_ROLE_MBR_ATTR_DATA_T where KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID = '25') / insert into role_attr_temp (ROLE_MBR_ID) select ROLE_MBR_ID from KRIM_ROLE_MBR_T where ACTV_TO_DT is null and ROLE_ID = '6' and ROLE_MBR_ID not in (select role_mbr_id from KRIM_ROLE_MBR_ATTR_DATA_T where KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID = '25') / insert into role_attr_temp (ROLE_MBR_ID) select ROLE_MBR_ID from KRIM_ROLE_MBR_T where ACTV_TO_DT is null and ROLE_ID = '3000015' and ROLE_MBR_ID not in (select role_mbr_id from KRIM_ROLE_MBR_ATTR_DATA_T where KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID = '25') / update role_attr_temp set ATTR_DATA_ID = krim_attr_data_id_s.NEXTVAL /
update ROLE_ATTR_TEMP SET KIM_TYP_ID = '28', KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID = '25', ATTR_VAL = 'Y' / update role_attr_temp set OBJ_ID =SYS_GUID() /
insert into KRIM_ROLE_MBR_ATTR_DATA_T ( ATTR_DATA_ID, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, ROLE_MBR_ID, KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID, KIM_TYP_ID, ATTR_VAL) select ATTR_DATA_ID, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, ROLE_MBR_ID, KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID, KIM_TYP_ID, ATTR_VAL FROM ROLE_ATTR_TEMP / drop table role_attr_temp / commit /
